CutSceneText.Text: Are you the one...who has awakened me...?
I am sorry for disturbing your slumber.
Both Humans and Daevas are suffering because of the forest spirits,
so I've come to ask a favour of you.
Hmm...yes...I knew something like this...was brewing.
I would be grateful for your help.
Now then...what do you have there?
This is a book of prophecy....
Hmm...this book contains the Oracle's Prophecy.
It is said that the power of the book affects its owner;
one who has been asleep for a long time.
I will give them a stern warning.
It is radiating such a powerful force!
It is an ancient book of Atreian myth.
You might be the hero foretold in the legends....
Even the conversation we are having now is mentioned in here!
